Summary: this story should have been tolded a long time ago
divs: Sighting Detailsbeing an ex-McDonnell retired worker i have always remembered a story that my co-worker told me, this happen several years ago, he said one night as him and his wife were sleeping something woke him up and he was swipping at it with his hand, he said he became awake there was a black Spiral Ball about the size of a softball hovering about two feet from his head he said when he became fully awake that the spiral moved to the end of his bed ,his wife woke up and the spiral moved up too the ceiling and moved real slow too the door of the bedroom dropped down real slow like and went under the door jam, he jumped up and went into the other room where the object had disappeared and he never seen it again. this was about the sametime that this other worker from McDonnell-douglas seen the big object on highway 47 in lincoln county Mo. i know this guy good he would never make up a story and has never reported it. just wondetred what you guys think, could it have been some kind of a probe.
